title: IHC grants time to HEC chairman for comments
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 01 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Tuesday granted time to Higher Education Commission (HEC) Chairman Dr Mukhtar Ahmed for comments in a plea against his appointment.
IHCâ€™s Justice Miangul Hassan Aurangzeb, who heard the case, accepted the request of Dr Mukhtar for granting time for submission of his comments.
The court consequently adjourned the case till October 30.
